content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new composite structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple recovery attempts to create a Lab at Position(0.5, 2.5) did not result in a placed entity, so no operational Lab structure exists.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities Usage Errors
 – Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) when calling get_entities.
 – Do not supply positional arguments if the function is defined to take none; confirm the function’s signature and pass parameters accordingly.
 – Always check that the return value is a valid iterable before filtering or iterating.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Issues
 – Verify that a Lab item is available in the inventory before attempting to place one at a target position.
 – Before crafting a Lab, ensure that sufficient resources and all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available; note that some ingredients require dedicated crafting machines or furnace operations.
 – Guard against NoneType errors by validating that searches (e.g. for existing Labs) return a proper list before processing.

• Resource Conversion and Fallback Strategies
 – When a required structure (Lab) is unavailable, implement fallback approaches only after confirming resource availability; incomplete smelting or production processes can lead to missing intermediate ingredients and further crafting failures.
